org.spongepowered.api.text

Class Texts

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.Texts

  • public final class Texts
extends Object
    Utility class to work with and create Text.

      • of

        public static Text of(Object... objects)
        Builds a Text from a given array of objects.

        For instance, you can use this like Texts.of(TextColors.DARK_AQUA, "Hi", TextColors.AQUA, "Bye")

        This will create the correct Text instance if the input object is the input for one of the Text types or convert the object to a string otherwise.

        Parameters:
        objects - The object array
        Returns:
        The built text object

        public static TextBuilder builder()
        Creates a TextBuilder with empty text.
        Returns:
        A new text builder with empty text

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The parsed text
        Throws:

      • parseJsonLenient

        public static Text parseJsonLenient(String json)
                             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Parses the specified JSON text and returns the parsed result.

        Unlike parseJson(String) this will ignore some formatting errors and parse the JSON data more leniently.

        Parameters:
        json - The JSON text
        Returns:
        The parsed text
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the JSON couldn't be parsed
